short_summary: Meeting the needs of Indigenous offenders through spiritual and cultural service and the use of traditional ceremonies and practices
description: The Correctional Service of Canada proposes to enter into an Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the delivery of spiritual and cultural services and the use of traditional ceremonies and practices for the benefit of Indigenous offenders. The proposed contract is for a period of one (1) year, from April 1st, 2023 to March 31st, 2024, with an option to extend for two (2) additional one-year periods. The proposed contract is estimated to be worth approximately $270,941.71 (GST/HST extra).
